item.title: 2017-03-01 js, karma, protractor, npm, bash, akamai
item.description: javascript and node No more just adding things to the package.json HA! To add an entry to your package.json's dependencies: npm install <package_name> --save To add an entry to your package.json's devDependencies: npm install <package_name> --save-dev version numbers and what they actually mean https://docs.npmjs.com/getting-started/semantic-versioning Patch releases: 1.0 or 1.0.x or ~1.0.4 Minor releases: 1 or 1.x or ^1.0.4 Major releases: * or x testing How fast can I fill in all the holes for TDD… not fast enough apparently ;)
